reviews.review: este juego es GOD espero no estar muerto cuando salga el Half life 3 xd

I can't believe I went 18 years without playing HL2.

This is a masterwork. The level design is unmatched. The action is superb. It says a lot when a game from 2004 feels fresh in 2022. 

Enough said.

Here's to 3. Whenever and wherever. I'll be there.
guns go pow on zombies it fun
The best FPS experience ever, the game holds up pretty well, its crazy to think it was made in 2004. The soundtrack is amazing.

Good: Another half life game
Bad: Game's name not Full Life
Incredible game, the two other episodes are also really great. Buy this and the other episodes if you want a great gaming experience.

Just come back to enjoy nostalgic memories. 
This game released in 2004 and it is still way better than most games nowadays.
best fps game of all time
One of the best games I've experienced.

This is one of the greatest video games I have ever played in my life. I found the first Half-Life to be overrated and dated, but this game is still amazing after being around for almost 20 years (as of this review, anyway).

I really enjoyed playing this game, the story is really good, it's fun and worth every penny, I only felt like there should be an aiming system cuz it would make aiming better.
I played the whole game, it took 18 hours to beat, I don't play games all my day so it took me a week to finish the story playing some hours per day, it really makes you feel like you're inside the game, I recommend this game, buy it and you're gonna have hours of fun.
Best game ever, If you have Garry's Mod this game will let you play on maps from Half-Life 2. Over all I would want it to be free for everyone I recommend this.

A Scientist, a government man, a crippled guy who tries to get the scientist to sleep with his daughter, the daughter, some aliens, and a moss woman come together to take down the police.   10/10

A masterpiece. This is simply one of the best video games ever. 

Do I need to say more? Perhaps I can ramble on for hours about its use of physics engine, the perfect pacing, level design etc., etc.  but it’s pointless to repeat in 2022 what everyone said already. 

It’s just like Aliens or Terminator 2 in movies. it “raised the bar” for the entire video game industry back then, and more importantly, it is still way more fun than most modern games out there after so many years.
Топовая игра от Valve, вошедшая в историю как одна из лучших в жанре Action.
One of many Valve games that you [i]must[/i] play!
